text:
"Tomorrow" is a song by the Australian rock band Silverchair. It was released as the group's first single in 1994, and was later re-recorded for their 1995 debut album "Frogstomp". It reached number-one on the charts in Australia, becoming their first of three number-one singles there.
It was written by the group's lead singer and guitarist Daniel Johns, as well as the group's drummer, Ben Gillies.
